original_text: Because of that, I am afraid of him. When I think about all these things, I am very afraid. Because of that,
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 그 앞에서 떨며 지각을 얻어 그를 두려워하리라

sentences.original_text: Because of that, I am afraid of him.
When I think about all these things,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이 모든 것들을 생각할 때,
